snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel appeared at a wreath-laying ceremony at the Tomb of the Unknowns at Arlington National Cemetery with a bandage on his cheek....

headline.print_headline: Hagel Sports Face Bandage at Veterans Day Ceremony
headline.main: Hagel Sports Face Bandage at Veterans Day Ceremony

lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel appeared at a wreath-laying ceremony at the Tomb of the Unknowns at Arlington National Cemetery with a bandage on his cheek.
